thread.title: BRIEF-Skycity Entertainment Group Posts HY Net Profit Of NZ$93.5 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Skycity Entertainment Group Posts HY Net Profit Of NZ$93.5 Mln
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Skycity Entertainment Group Ltd:
* DECLARED INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 10 NZ CENTS PER SHARE * HY NET PROFIT AFTER TAX NZ$ ‍93.5​ MILLION VERSUS NZ$83.8 MILLION
* HY REPORTED REVENUE FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES NZ$504.6 MILLION VERSUS NZ$ 484.2 MILLION
* CONTINUES TO TARGET NZ$10 BILLION INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS TURNOVER FOR FY18 FOR THE GROUP‍​
* REMAINS ON-TRACK TO ACHIEVE MODEST GROWTH IN GROUP EBITDA FOR FY18‍​
* OPERATING MARGINS IN 2H18 ARE EXPECTED TO BE BROADLY CONSISTENT WITH 1H18 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
